page.title: 13Barrow Farm
page.content: {Barrow Farm}is situated two kilometres East of Blackmore.It is a riding centre for the{disabled}and it caters for the{mentally}and{physically handicapped.The riding centre was opened in{1976}but they found that in the winter the weather prevented full use of the riding facilities.And so they decided to build an indoor school.They held{fund raising events like coffee mornings,jumble sales and sponsored walks.They raised Â£100,000.The biggest event at{Barrow} {Farm}was when{Princess Ann}came to open it on October 18th 1984.The children come from{special schools}in the area.The centre is very safety conscious and when they get their next lot of money they are going to buy some new hats.{Social Concern}is shown by local voluntary helpers who escort and encourage the children.
